setup.welcome: Welcome to your first setup of wg-easy !

messageWelcome.whatIs: You have found the easiest way to install and manage WireGuard on any Linux host!
messageWelcome.warning: First of all, make sure you have a backup of your data if you want to migrate your users to your new wg-easy.
messageWelcome.next: Click on the arrow button to proceed to the next step.

setup.messageSetupCreateAdminUser: Please first enter an admin username and a strong secure password. This information will be used to log in to your administration panel.
setup.messageSetupHostPort: Please enter the host and port information. This will be used for the client configuration when setting up WireGuard on their devices.
setup.messageSetupMigration: Please provide the backup file if you want to migrate your data from your previous wg-easy version to your new setup.
setup.messageSetupValidation: Welcome to wg-easy ! The easiest way to run WireGuard VPN and Web-based Admin UI.

zod.id: Client ID must be a valid UUID
zod.address4: IPv4 Address must be a valid string
zod.name: Name must be a valid string
zod.nameMin: Name must be at least 1 Character
zod.file: File must be a valid string
zod.username: Username must be a valid string
zod.usernameMin: Username must be at least 8 Characters
zod.password: Password must be a valid string
zod.passwordMin: Password must be at least 12 Characters
zod.passwordUppercase: Password must have at least 1 uppercase letter
zod.passwordLowercase: Password must have at least 1 lowercase letter
zod.passwordNumber: Password must have at least 1 number
zod.passwordSpecial: Password must have at least 1 special character
zod.remember: Remember must be a valid boolean
zod.expireDate: expiredDate must be a valid string
zod.expireDateMin: expiredDate must be at least 1 Character
zod.otl: oneTimeLink must be a valid string
zod.otlMin: oneTimeLink must be at least 1 Character
zod.features: key must be a valid string
zod.ftBool: enabled must be a valid boolean
zod.ftObj: value must be a valid object
zod.ftObj2: features must be a valid record
zod.stat: statistics must be a valid object
zod.statBool: enabled must be a valid boolean
zod.statNumber: chartType must be a valid number
zod.body: Body must be a valid object
zod.host: Host must be a valid string
zod.hostMin: Host must contain at least 1 character
zod.port: Port must be a valid number

name: Name
deleteDialog1: Are you sure you want to delete
noPrivKey: This client has no known private key. Cannot create Configuration.
titleRememberMe: Stay logged after closing the browser
